TopicTitle: Twitch Thursdays: Tanuki Chau's 24 Hour Journey

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_n1bnrf7fec1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=KSP-TV%253A%2B24%2BHours%2Bof%2BKerbal%2Bwith%2BTanuki%252C%2BLets%2BGo%2Beverywhere%2Band%2Bcome%2Bback.&channel=ksptv&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&archive_id=504013290"></object></p>

<p><a href="http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv/profile"><strong>KSP-TV</strong> </a>personality, <strong>Tanuki Chau</strong> recently underwent a stress test of galactic proportions. How much <em><strong>Kerbal Space Program</strong></em> could one handle in 24 straight hours of play? <strong>Tanuki</strong> streamed her entire session in what is the longest single broadcast in <em><strong>KSP-TV</strong></em> history. She made it in one piece and carries a major badge of honor for it. Now you can relive the entire experience right here on <strong>Twitch Thursdays</strong>.</p>
An ENTIRE DAY? How??? Dosen't a person need to eat and sleep? whoah.
And then there is the "powder room". One can eat and drink during the live streaming broadcast.

Sleep is for the weak.

I recently came to the conclusion that sleep is the source of all my powers. So don't give it up lightly.
I ate, I had things to drink. And I would take stretch breaks and restroom breaks. However in total, playtime equaled 24 hours.

Congratulations tanuki. I've done a 72-hour work stint before but not while presenting at the same time. (Then I went to bed for 2 days and took a week off, having done a month's work in that 72 hours).

:-) Hope you're catching up with your sleep now :-)

Yes I made a complete recovery. I'm more surprised I was didn't slip up on swearing. I could feel my little 'swear word firewall' slip and crumble about 17 hours in. The rest was me just trying really hard not to say bad things when bad things happened. The last 3 hours I think I went insane.
were all insane I our own way so don't worry
Dear god, what were you thinking... wait, now I want to try this... oh, no.
